Title: Delirium
Writer: Lauren Oliver (based on novel), Karyn Usher (script)
Actors: Emma Roberts, Jeanine Mason, Billy Campbell, Ian Anthony Dale
Plot: In this dystopian society love is a disease. Once some one is 18 they are allowed to get the cure. Lena has always dreamed about the perfect life. Her evaluation and then cure is coming up. Will she get the cure, or will someone get in the way.
